document.full_text: gasoline and food prices hoisted u.s. inflation to a 2-1/2-year high in april, but there was little sign of a broader pick-up in consumer prices that would trouble the federal reserve.
document.title: inflation hits 2-1/2 year high, seen peaking
lines_and_colors: gasoline and food prices hoisted u.s. inflation to a 2-1/2-year high in april, but there was little sign of a broader pick-up in consumer prices that would trouble the federal reserve.
